mapper.insert: insert into storage( title, url, storageType, itemOrder, createTime, updateTime ) values( #{title}, #{url}, #{storageType}, #{itemOrder}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update storage set title=#{title}, url=#{url}, storageType=#{storageType}, updateTime=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from storage where storageType=#{storageType} order by id asc limit 5000
